title: Hiding the Login Music-file???
body:
So until a few patches ago, you could find the Music playing during the Login-Screen around this folder adress:

**(Game folder)** \RADS \projects \lol-air-client \releases \ _**(release no)**_ \deploy\mod\lgn\themes

and there you found folders for the last 5 or so "patches" with background images and the music.

But since the Galio remake, nada.
It was so far the easiest way to get the wonderful login music without many hurdles.
Did they just change the folder path? Or did they change that completely and are storing the music not on my PC anymore??
Searching for "Loginscreen", "music" or similar stuff did not yield any results.

Anyone know anything about this or is versed well enough in the client working to help a fellow League-music-lover??
Much appreciated.

replies.body:
The old League client was developed in Adobe AIR, which is where you found it before.

The new client is sexy HTML5 goodness.

As the transfer from the old to the new client occured, pieces and pieces of the AIR client were systematically removed.

This is why you can't find them anymore.

Hey Gimonfu,

You should be able to find most of our music at https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends 

Hope this helps!
